name: Neotericuk
overview:
Neoteric UK, Formed in 2004 have many years experience in the web design & development arena, and creates solutions for a diverse range of customers throughout UK.

The services that Neoteric UK offers are relatively inexpensive compared to many other providers in the website / ecommerce ‘design and build’ arena and give very high specification websites for very modest sums of cash without any of the ‘hassle’ of larger organizations. Often these websites are delivered with an easy-to-use CMS (Content Management System) in the backend.

Crucially, unlike many other players in this market, Neoteric is proud to admit that they also offer unlimited design concepts within the process - the aim is to keep the customer happy.

Neoteric website and ecommerce solutions are perfect for any small business. Available in London and throughout the United Kingdom, the solutions are bespoke (ie; Not from a template) and have the ability to be completely customized and are very affordable.

Products and services:

Website Design E-commerce Website Development Search Engine Marketing Custom Software Development Web Hosting solutions
